patient unique ID related to the value, may be null

title: 5) List to patient (Dates)

patient unique ID related to the value, may be null

title: 2) List (Page)
name: listFromPage
description: list all records from a sensor in a page

Parameter.description: each page has 25 records, page must be greater or equal to 1

patient unique ID related to the value, may be null

title: 05) Find
name: find
description: find a specific vitabox if the requester is related to it.

Success 200.description: vitabox latitude, min: -90, max: 90 (based on google maps coordinates)
vitabox longitude, min: -180, max: 180 (based on google maps coordinates)
flag indicating if the requester is sponsor of that vitabox (only if NOT admin)
configuration's structure, defined by vitabox (only if admin)
flag indicating if the vitabox was already registered (only if admin)
flag indicating if the vitabox was already activated (only if admin)

title: 19) Get Boards
name: getBoards
description: get boards of specific vitabox if the requester is related to it.

Success 200.description: status of the board, only to admin, the other users will only receive boards with "is_active=true"
model of each board, contains an id, type and name, the vitabox itself wiil receive the transdutors list of each model
